translations: v．扫射，低空攻击：指飞机在低空对地面目标进行机枪或火箭弹的攻击。
· The fighter plane strafes the enemy's position.
战斗机对敌人阵地进行扫射。

sentences.sentence: Two-thirds of all the strafes , quarrels and lawsuits in the world arise from one simple cause - money!
sentences.translation: 世上三分之二的冲突、争吵及诉讼均肇因于一个简单的原因-金钱！

sentences.sentence: On my 255, 8 the day after where I got 256, if I cant feel 8 strafes I'm just gonna do 7, but if I feel 8, which happened twice in my life, well im gonna do 8!
sentences.translation: 在我的255那个视频里是7个，那天之后我用8个跳了个256，如果我感觉不到8个加速，我会用7个加速，但如果我感觉有8个，如果真是在我生命中发生了两次，那我会用8个！

sentences.sentence: Although the scope of improvement in this particular run is very narrow, but with the application of a few ground-strafes in between the run, a few milli-seconds might be gained.
sentences.translation: 虽然在这个特殊的运行范围是很窄的改善，但与少数地面strafes运行应用程序之间，几毫秒可能获得。
